title: Kid-friendly UI shell and navigation
description: Build responsive HTML/CSS layout for landing, player select, mode select, play, and summary screens with large tap targets and simple state toggles.
acceptance_criteria: Screens exist and switchable without errors; layout legible on mobile and desktop; start flow can reach play view and return to summary.

title: Space Times MVP
description: Kid-friendly multiplication trainer MVP per PRD/TDD: offline web app, spaced repetition drills for tables 1-10, player selection/persistence, audio feedback, summary screen, and kid-friendly UI states.
acceptance_criteria: End-to-end flow matches PRD/TDD: landing to start, play session with spaced repetition, summary with stats, offline/localStorage only, kid-appropriate UI.

title: Player profiles and local persistence
description: Implement player records in localStorage (id, name, fact streaks, last session, active player, sound setting) with add/select flow and safe defaults.
acceptance_criteria: User can add and select a player; active player and settings persist across reloads; stored fact streaks and last session snapshot round-trip without errors.

title: Gameplay flow, feedback, and summary
description: Wire UI to session logic: prompt rendering, keyboard/keypad input handling, submit/feedback cycle, progress labels, and session-end summary that updates player fact streaks and last session stats.
acceptance_criteria: User can answer prompts via keyboard or on-screen keypad; immediate correct/wrong feedback shows correct answer on miss; progress updates each turn; summary displays counts/accuracy and persists streak updates for the active player.

title: Audio feedback and mute toggle
description: Add short correct/incorrect audio cues with respectful volume, gated behind first user interaction; provide mute/unmute control persisted per player/settings.
acceptance_criteria: Correct/wrong sounds play after initial user gesture when sound is on; mute toggle silences playback and persists across reloads; no console errors if audio unavailable.

title: Spaced repetition deck and session state
description: Build deck generation and queue logic for single-table and mixed modes; maintain SessionState (queue, asked, correct/incorrect, history) with weight adjustments on correct/wrong per TDD.
acceptance_criteria: Queue initializes from selected mode; wrong answers reinsert near front with streak reset; correct answers reduce frequency via tail reinsertion/shuffle; session length cap respected; state updates without errors through a session.
